# Media Capture Tool

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/media-capture-tool-for-fortnite>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:22:26.625460

---

The **Media** category in the **Creative Island Settings** provides a way for you to capture an image that you can use as a lobby background for your island.

[![](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/dce68ce8-f97a-4004-aa36-84bbf8bccbe6?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/dce68ce8-f97a-4004-aa36-84bbf8bccbe6?resizing_type=fit)

1. Before capturing your background, go to where on your island you want to capture.
2. Frame the shot you want to get, then go to **Island Settings** and select **Media**.
3. Click the **Lobby Background** tile to go to your island in **Capture**mode.

### Capture Your Image

There are three buttons at the bottom middle of the screen:

[![](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/220e8700-b547-46b0-b04d-e47dbc64f976?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/220e8700-b547-46b0-b04d-e47dbc64f976?resizing_type=fit)

- **(E) Capture:** Captures the image.
- **(Q) Last Position:** Places your avatar (or camera) to the last spot it was at in the game.
- **(T) Toggle Overlay:** This will toggle the avatar on and off, in case you want a background without characters.

Press the corresponding hotkey (**E**, **Q**, or **T**) to use any of these features.

1. When you're ready, click **Capture**.  You'll be prompted to **Confirm**or **Retake**the image.
2. To find and use the image, click the **Open Content Folder** tile.  This will open your local folder where the image is saved.

The default path for the saved screenshot is
The default path for the saved screenshot is <YourUserName>\Local\FortniteGame\Saved\ Screenshots\WindowsClient.

Images are saved at a resolution of 2048 x 1024.
